Package backend.tradesystem.managers

Class HandleTradeLimitsManager

java.lang.Object
backend.tradesystem.managers.Manager
backend.tradesystem.managers.HandleTradeLimitsManager
public class HandleTradeLimitsManager
extends Manager
This deals with everything relating to trade limits

    • HandleTradeLimitsManager

      public HandleTradeLimitsManager() throws java.io.IOException
      Initialize the objects to get items from databases
      Throws:

  • Method Details

    • setLimit

      public void setLimit​(TraderProperties traderProperty, int limit) throws UserNotFoundException
      Sets the specified limit for all traders
      Parameters:
      traderProperty - the property (limit) to change
      limit - the new value of the specified property
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - couldn't get traders

    • setLimitSpecific

      public void setLimitSpecific​(TraderProperties property, java.lang.String userId, int newLimit) throws UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      Changes the specified property of the specified user
      Parameters:
      property - the property (limit) to change
      userId - the user who's property will be changed
      newLimit - the new limit
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user isn't found
      AuthorizationException - if the user isn't a trader

    • changeIncompleteTradeLimit

      public void changeIncompleteTradeLimit​(java.lang.String userId, int newLimit) throws UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      Changes the specified user's incomplete trade limit
      Parameters:
      userId - the user who's trade limit will be changed
      newLimit - the new trade limit
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user isn't found
      AuthorizationException - if the user isn't a trader

    • changeWeeklyTradeLimit

      public void changeWeeklyTradeLimit​(java.lang.String userId, int newLimit) throws UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      Changes the specified user's weekly trade limit
      Parameters:
      userId - the user who's trade limit will be changed
      newLimit - the new trade limit
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user isn't found
      AuthorizationException - if the user isn't a trader
